properties.PropertiesService.name: PropertiesService
properties.PropertiesService.doc: Allows scripts to store simple data in key-value pairs scoped to one script, one user of a script, or one document in which an add-on is used. Properties cannot be shared between scripts. For more information about when to use each type of property, see the guide to the Properties service.

method.name: getDocumentProperties
method.doc: Gets a property store (for this script only) that all users can access within the open document, spreadsheet, or form.

method.name: getScriptProperties
method.doc: Gets a property store that all users can access, but only within this script.

method.name: getUserProperties
method.doc: Gets a property store that only the current user can access, and only within this script.

properties.ScriptProperties.name: ScriptProperties
properties.ScriptProperties.doc: Deprecated. This class is deprecated and should not be used in new scripts.

method.name: deleteAllProperties
method.doc: Deletes all properties.

method.name: deleteProperty
method.doc: Deletes the property with the given key.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: key for property to delete

method.name: getKeys
method.doc: Get all of the available keys.

method.name: getProperties
method.doc: Get all of the available properties at once.

method.name: getProperty
method.doc: Returns the value associated with the provided key, or null if there is no such value.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: key for the value to retrieve

method.name: setProperties
method.doc: Bulk-sets all the properties drawn from the given object.

argument.name: properties
argument.doc: an object containing the properties to set.

method.name: setProperties
method.doc: Bulk-sets all the properties drawn from the given object.

argument.name: properties
argument.doc: an object containing the properties to set.

argument.name: deleteAllOthers
argument.doc: whether to delete all existing properties.

method.name: setProperty
method.doc: Persists the specified in value with the provided key.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: key for property

argument.name: value
argument.doc: value to associate with the key

properties.Properties.name: Properties
properties.Properties.doc: The properties object acts as the interface to access user, document, or script properties. The specific property type depends on which of the three methods of PropertiesService the script called: PropertiesService.getDocumentProperties(), PropertiesService.getUserProperties(), or PropertiesService.getScriptProperties(). Properties cannot be shared between scripts. For more information about property types, see the guide to the Properties service.

method.name: deleteAllProperties
method.doc: Deletes all properties in the current Properties store.

method.name: deleteProperty
method.doc: Deletes the property with the given key in the current Properties store.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: the key for the property to delete

method.name: getKeys
method.doc: Gets all keys in the current Properties store.

method.name: getProperties
method.doc: Gets a copy of all key-value pairs in the current Properties store.

method.name: getProperty
method.doc: Gets the value associated with the given key in the current Properties store, or null if no such key exists.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: the key for the property value to retrieve

method.name: setProperties
method.doc: Sets all key-value pairs from the given object in the current Properties store.

argument.name: properties
argument.doc: an object containing key-values pairs to set

method.name: setProperties
method.doc: Sets all key-value pairs from the given object in the current Properties store, optionally deleting all other properties in the store.

argument.name: properties
argument.doc: an object containing key-values pairs to set

argument.name: deleteAllOthers
argument.doc: true to delete all other key-value pairs in the properties object; false to not

method.name: setProperty
method.doc: Sets the given key-value pair in the current Properties store.

argument.name: key
argument.doc: the key for the property

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the value to associate with the key
